pages.text: .$(l)Effect:$() Grants the holder Conduit Power while in water and while the totem is active$(br)$(l)Enchants:$() $(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinkets/totem_of_amethyst)Totem of Amethyst$()$(br)$(l)Max Level:$() 1$(br)$(l)Active/Passive:$() Active, drains durability while using and in water$(br)$(l)Tier:$() Medium$(br)$(l)Incompatibilities:$() Other active totem augments.
